alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Potter; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 1:39AM MST until January 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ FRIDAY NIGHT... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ FRIDAY NIGHT TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Friday night. For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Friday night to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Potter; Walworth
